text: Uye ndivo (Allah) vakakuitai vatevedzeri panyika (vamwe vachitsiva vamwe), uye vakakwidziridza vamwe venyu pazvidanho, vamwe pamusoro pevamwe, kuti vave vanokuedzai pane izvo zvavakakupai. Zvirokwazvo, Tenzi vako vanoranga nekuchimbidza, uye zvirokwazvo ndivo vanoregerera zvikuru, vane tsitsi zhinji
